title: No Reason (2017)
brief_description: The film clip for Bonobo’s No Reason, directed by Oscar Hudson, explores the Japanese concept of Hikikomori – young Japanese people who become so overwhelmed by the pressures of life that they retreat to their bedrooms for years at a time.

constellations_other.name: Tracking cinema
constellations_other.description: A constellation looking at the evolution of the tracking / dolly shot.
